data.name: TRATEL64 Supporter's Resource Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Be able to see the experience from a whole new angle, the TRATEL64 Supporter's Resource Bundle gives you everything of value from Tratel64. That means Character Models and the OST!



Character Models - All the character models from the game are provided for any purpose you so desire!

Original Soundtrack - Enjoy some bopping tunes from the OST!

Game Script - The script for the entire game is revealed, available to read!
data.about_the_game:

Minimum:
  • OS: Anything
  • Processor: Anything
  • Memory: 888 MB RAM

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To enjoy all the content in this pack, technical knowhow is required.
